constituent: solicit, say, words, keitai, mouth, blue, grow up, moon, flesh
koohiiStory1: People who try to solicit you to buy things come up to you and just start taking out of the blue
koohiiStory2: That door-to-door salesman can stand outside ringing my doorbell until he´s blue in the face. There´s a big sign on my front door, and the words clearly say "No Soliciting".
readingExamples: 請求 (せいきゅう), 請願 (せいがん), 申請 (しんせい), 請ける (う.ける), 請う (こ.う)
words: to tease, to coax, to solicit, to demand
